messages.content: You are an expert local guide who has lived in Daejeon for over 20 years. Create personalized travel plans using exact local data.

Create a 2-day travel plan for 2 people with $300 budget interested in Nature/Scenery. Local restaurants: Sungsimdang Main Store - 15, Daejong-ro 480beon-gil, Jung-gu, Daejeon (042-253-3535), famous bakery with fried croquette bread, visit weekday mornings, ₩5,000-15,000. Kalguksu Master - 123-45, Wolpyeong-dong, Seo-gu, Daejeon (042-472-2828), hand-pulled noodles, amazing kimchi, ₩7,000-10,000. Attractions: Daecheongho Lake 500-ri Trail - Chu-dong, Dong-gu, Daejeon, lake walking trail, best at sunset 4PM-6PM. Hanbat Arboretum - 169, Dunsan-daero, Seo-gu, Daejeon, huge botanical garden, West garden is larger, best 10AM-4PM.

{"title": "2-Day Daejeon Nature & Budget Experience", "overview": "Perfect nature-focused plan for 2 people exploring Daejeon's beautiful natural attractions within $300 budget", "itinerary": [{"day": 1, "theme": "Lake Discovery & Local Flavors", "activities": [{"time": "09:00", "place": "Sungsimdang Main Store", "description": "Start your day with Daejeon's most famous bakery breakfast", "address": "15, Daejong-ro 480beon-gil, Jung-gu, Daejeon", "localTip": "Try the fried croquette bread - it's filling and affordable at ₩2,000", "contact": "042-253-3535"}, {"time": "11:00", "place": "Daecheongho Lake 500-ri Trail", "description": "Scenic free walk along the beautiful lake trail perfect for photos", "address": "Chu-dong, Dong-gu, Daejeon", "localTip": "Bring snacks and water - no entry fee required, best photo spots near the bridge", "contact": ""}, {"time": "16:00", "place": "Daecheongho Lake Sunset Viewing", "description": "Return for the stunning sunset view that locals love", "address": "Chu-dong, Dong-gu, Daejeon", "localTip": "This is when locals come for evening walks - magical lighting for photos", "contact": ""}]}, {"day": 2, "theme": "Botanical Garden & Authentic Dining", "activities": [{"time": "10:00", "place": "Hanbat Arboretum", "description": "Explore the massive botanical garden in the city center", "address": "169, Dunsan-daero, Seo-gu, Daejeon", "localTip": "Visit the West garden first - it's larger and has better walking paths", "contact": ""}, {"time": "13:00", "place": "Kalguksu Master", "description": "Authentic hand-pulled noodle lunch at local favorite spot", "address": "123-45, Wolpyeong-dong, Seo-gu, Daejeon", "localTip": "Their kimchi is incredibly delicious and free refills available", "contact": "042-472-2828"}]}], "recommendations": {"restaurants": ["Sungsimdang Main Store", "Kalguksu Master"], "accommodations": ["Budget guesthouses near Yuseong Hot Springs"], "localTips": ["Use subway day pass for ₩4,500 to save money", "Many natural attractions in Daejeon are completely free", "Local markets offer budget-friendly meal options"]}}
You are an expert local guide who has lived in Daejeon for over 20 years. Create personalized travel plans using exact local data.

Create a 3-day luxury travel plan for 4 people with $1000 budget interested in Food/Dining and Hot Springs. Local restaurants: Baekje Galbi - 211, Daedeok-daero, Seo-gu, Daejeon (042-525-0011), 50-year tradition galbi restaurant, lunch sets have great value, ₩15,000-35,000. Yong's Jokbal - 33, Jungang-ro 121beon-gil, Jung-gu, Daejeon (042-222-0008), local favorite pig's trotters, open until late night, ₩25,000-40,000. Attractions: Yuseong Hot Springs - Oncheon-ro, Yuseong-gu, Daejeon (042-611-2114), natural alkaline hot springs, quieter after 9PM. Daejeon Jungang Market - 488, Daejong-ro, Jung-gu, Daejeon, 70-year traditional market, best 11AM-2PM.

portions are generous for 4 people and includes banchan", "contact": "042-525-0011"}, {"time": "19:00", "place": "Yuseong Hot Springs Evening Session", "description": "Relax in natural alkaline hot springs after your meal", "address": "Oncheon-ro, Yuseong-gu, Daejeon", "localTip": "Evening hours after 9PM are much quieter - Create a 1-day plan for solo traveler with $150 budget interested in Culture/History. Local restaurants: Wanggwan Restaurant - 246, Bomun-ro, Jung-gu, Daejeon (042-253-1142), traditional soup restaurant favored by locals, visit early morning for richer broth, ₩8,000-12,000. Sungsimdang Main Store - 15, Daejong-ro 480beon-gil, Jung-gu, Daejeon (042-253-3535), famous bakery, weekday mornings have shorter lines. Attractions: Daejeon Jungang Market - 488, Daejong-ro, Jung-gu, Daejeon, 70-year traditional market, authentic local food, best 11AM-2PM.

{"title": "1-Day Daejeon Cultural Heritage Experience", "overview": "Authentic cultural immersion for solo traveler exploring Daejeon's traditional food culture and local life within $150 budget", "itinerary": [{"day": 1, "theme": "Traditional Food Culture Discovery", "activities": [{"time": "07:00", "place": "Wanggwan Restaurant", "description": "Start with authentic Korean breakfast at traditional soup restaurant", "address": "246, Bomun-ro, Jung-gu, Daejeon", "localTip": "Early morning visit ensures the richest, most concentrated broth - exactly how locals eat", "contact": "042-253-1142"}, {"time": "09:30", "place": "Sungsimdang Main Store", "description": "Experience Daejeon's most famous bakery and local breakfast culture", "address": "15, Daejong-ro 480beon-gil, Jung-gu, Daejeon", "localTip": "Weekday morning means shorter lines - observe how locals start their day here", "contact": "042-253-3535"}, {"time": "11:30", "place": "Daejeon Jungang Market", "description": "Immerse in 70-year traditional market culture and authentic local life", "address": "488, Daejong-ro, Jung-gu, Daejeon", "localTip": "Peak hours show real local life - vendors are most active and talkative now", "contact": ""}]}], "recommendations": {"restaurants": ["Wanggwan Restaurant", "Sungsimdang Main Store"], "accommodations": ["Local guesthouses near Jung-gu"], "localTips": ["Solo travelers get more personal attention from vendors", "Bring small bills for market purchases", "Learn basic Korean greetings - vendors appreciate the effort"]}}

Create a 2-day plan for family with children, 5 people, $400 budget, interested in Nature/Scenery and Family Activities. Local restaurants: Kalguksu Master - 123-45, Wolpyeong-dong, Seo-gu, Daejeon (042-472-2828), hand-pulled noodles, amazing kimchi and free refills, ₩7,000-10,000. Sungsimdang Main Store - 15, Daejong-ro 480beon-gil, Jung-gu, Daejeon (042-253-3535), famous bakery perfect for families. Attractions: Hanbat Arboretum - 169, Dunsan-daero, Seo-gu, Daejeon, huge botanical garden perfect for families, West garden is larger, best 10AM-4PM. Gyejoksan Yellow Clay Trail - Jang-dong, Daedeok-gu, Daejeon, barefoot walking trail, better barefoot than shoes, foot spa available, best 9AM-11AM.

buy extra for snacks during garden visit", "contact": "042-253-3535"}, {"time": "10:30", "place": "Hanbat Arboretum", "description": "Explore massive family-friendly botanical garden with plenty of space for children", "address": "169, Dunsan-daero, Seo-gu, Daejeon", "localTip": "Head to West garden first -
